name: BlockChain
title: Sr. Blockchain Developer, NFT | Solana | Rust | Golang | ERC404

summary:
As a seasoned Blockchain/NFT/Web3 Engineer, Full Stack Developer, and Cloud Data/Solution Architect, I bring over 8 years of comprehensive IT experience, with the last 3 years deeply focused on the fascinating realm of Blockchain, Ethereum, FLOW, Solana, NFT, and Web3 technologies. In addition to my blockchain endeavors, I possess over 5 years of experience in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Computer Vision, leveraging tools and platforms such as Python, AWS, MS Azure Machine Learning, Google Cloud Platform, and Amazon SageMaker. My proficiency extends to building and training custom data models with OpenAIâ€™s ChatGPT, incorporating Q&A, summarization features, and integrating AI and ChatGPT models with various applications, enhancing conversational data analytics and AI chatbots using platforms like Vicuna, AWS Lex, and Dialogflow.

My portfolio showcases a range of projects from blockchain developments and NFT marketplaces to past web projects, highlighting my capability to deliver complex solutions across various domains. My clientele includes top-tier companies, including Google, and spans start-ups to Fortune 500, demonstrating my adaptability to diverse team settings, including international and distributed teams.

Key skills include AI and machine learning tools (ChatGPT, RAG, OpenAI, Generative AI, LangChain, LLM, Pinecone, Vicuna, Llama2, BARD, Vertex AI, Vector Embedding), programming languages (Python, Solidity, Cadence, Rust, C++), blockchain and Web3 development tools (Web3.js, Node.js, React, Truffle, Ganache, MetaMask), and proficiency in NLP, DevOps, cloud platforms, and automation tools.

Iâ€™m committed to innovation and architecting profitable solutions, evidenced by my membership in Upwork Talent Enterprise Clouds, where clients regularly engage my services. I offer favorable hourly rates for long-term projects and retainer consulting, ensuring value-driven partnerships for groundbreaking solutions.
